only_plus_modal.title: Error
only_plus_modal.description: This feature is only available to Premium subscribers

crash_modal.title: Minecraft has been crashed
crash_modal.description: The error has already been reported to the developers.

preLoadCosmetics.title: Load cosmetic textures on startup
preLoadCosmetics.tooltip: This setting affects the speed at which the game starts. Turn it off if you want the game to start faster.

errors.title: Error
errors.file_error: This is not a skin texture

success.title: Success
success.description: Your skin has been successfully saved

change_username.title: Username changed on your Minecraft account
change_username.description: To run Silent Client, you need to have a Minecraft account username and a Silent Client username.
change_username.change: Change username on Silent Client account
